title: Juptyer kernel re-start: Cannot activate multiple GUI eventloops
body:
Running the Demo_yourowndata.ipynb on deeplabcut version 2.0.0.dev4. If I close GUI during marking and reset the kernel of the notebook, running the gui again produces the following error 

```
ERROR:root:Cannot activate multiple GUI eventloops
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
TypeError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-2-6005a6684cbf> in <module>()
      1 get_ipython().magic('gui wx')
----> 2 deeplabcut.label_frames(path_config_file)

/home/dlc/.conda/envs/dlc_env/lib/python3.6/site-packages/deeplabcut/generate_training_dataset/trainingsetmanipulation.py in label_frames(config)
     91     """
     92     startpath = os.getcwd()
---> 93     wd = Path(config).resolve().parents[0]
     94     os.chdir(str(wd))
     95 

/home/dlc/.conda/envs/dlc_env/lib/python3.6/pathlib.py in __new__(cls, *args, **kwargs)
    999         if cls is Path:
   1000             cls = WindowsPath if os.name == 'nt' else PosixPath
-> 1001         self = cls._from_parts(args, init=False)
   1002         if not self._flavour.is_supported:
   1003             raise NotImplementedError("cannot instantiate %r on your system"

/home/dlc/.conda/envs/dlc_env/lib/python3.6/pathlib.py in _from_parts(cls, args, init)
    654         # right flavour.
    655         self = object.__new__(cls)
--> 656         drv, root, parts = self._parse_args(args)
    657         self._drv = drv
    658         self._root = root

/home/dlc/.conda/envs/dlc_env/lib/python3.6/pathlib.py in _parse_args(cls, args)
    638                 parts += a._parts
    639             else:
--> 640                 a = os.fspath(a)
    641                 if isinstance(a, str):
    642                     # Force-cast str subclasses to str (issue #21127)

TypeError: expected str, bytes or os.PathLike object, not NoneType
```

If, prior to that, I delete the folder produced by create_new_project, and run whole notebook again, I still get the following error, but at least the GUI starts
`ERROR:root:Cannot activate multiple GUI eventloops`
